response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we believe it's worth every penny. Considering its significance and the benefits it brings to you, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $13,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate, tailored to maximize your satisfaction and ROI. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 13000}
